# Controller Canned Cycles

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-cycle`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Fixed cycles for drilling, boring, tapping

## Capabilities

- Handle canned cycles for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller canned cycles.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller canned cycles capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-gcode-reference`

## Hooks

- `gcode:cycle:generate`
- `gcode:cycle:validate`
